A:
k < array.length
array iis not null 
k >= 0

output:value of kth number
int [] array int k 

// cornercase
54637 2     
public class slution{
	public int [] kSmallLest(int [] array, int k){
	//corner case
		if(array.length == 0|| k ==0){
		return new int [0];
		}
		PriorityQueue<Integer> maxheap = new PriorityQueue<Integer> (k, Comparator(){
			public int comparator()
		})
	}
}
